description: A former Georgetown University tennis coach was sentenced on Friday to 2-1/2 years in prison for helping children of wealthy parents get into the school in exchange for nearly $3.5 million in bribes as part of a vast college admissions fraud scheme.
title: Georgetown's ex-tennis coach gets 2-1/2 years in prison in U.S. college scandal - Reuters

author: ABC News
description: Ohio State University was granted a trademark to use the word "THE" on apparel and items to promote its athletic teams by the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office.
title: Ohio State University granted trademark for 'THE' on merchandise
content:
Ohio State University was granted a trademark to use the word "THE" on apparel and merchandise to promote its athletic teams.
